channel.title: POSLink UI Design and User Guide
channel.description: Recent content on POSLink UI Design and User Guide

item.description: Option # Select Debit Account Type # Action OptionEntry.ACTION_SELECT_ACCOUNT_TYPE Category OptionEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are: TransMode.NORMAL TransMode.DEMO TransMode.TEST TransMode.TEST_AND_DEMO EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT Timeout (unit: ms). Default value is 30000. Type : Long

Common Option Intents # Select EMV AID # Action OptionEntry.ACTION_SELECT_AID Category OptionEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are: TransMode.NORMAL TransMode.DEMO TransMode.TEST TransMode.TEST_AND_DEMO EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT Timeout (unit: ms). Default value is 30000. Type : Long

Deprecated Option Intents # Select Cashback # Action OptionEntry.ACTION_SELECT_CASHBACK_AMOUNT Category OptionEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are: TransMode.NORMAL TransMode.DEMO TransMode.TEST TransMode.TEST_AND_DEMO EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT Timeout (unit: ms). Default value is 30000. Type : Long

Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are: TransMode.NORMAL TransMode.DEMO TransMode.TEST TransMode.TEST_AND_DEMO EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT Timeout (unit: ms). Default value is 30000.
